page.title: 19THE WOODSIDE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The centre acts as a focal point for trade and social activity within the community.It has a Supermarket,Paper shop,Green grocer,Butchers shop,DIY shop and a Public house.It's designed to provide for all the residents basic shopping needs without needing to travel to the centre of town,about three miles away.It also has a Health Centre and good parking facilities. There is a large area with raised flower beds and seating.The attitudes of local residents varied.Many thought it convenient and adequate for basic needs but there was also a feeling that it was untidy and in need of better maintainance.
